title: Synthesis, docking and biological evaluation of purine-5-N-isosteresas anti-inflammatory agents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17785-17800
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02970D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ahmed M. El-Saghier, Souhaila S. Enaili, Aly Abdou, Amany M. Hamed, Asmaa M. Kadry
An operationally simple one-pot three-component synthesis method for a series of diverse purine analogues of [1,2,4]-triazolo[1,3,5]triazine-2-carboxamide derivatives generated in situ via reaction of 2-hydrazinyl-N-(4-sulfamoylphenyl)-2-thioxoacetamide, cyanoguanidine and a variety of aldehydes.
